726842f-a.text:
Hawtree Creek Road, east side, north of One Hundred Thirty-fifth Ave. (formerly Hegeman Ave.), showing the Bethel Union Sunday School. It was used as a school in 1860. In 1873 it was designated District School No. 6; St. Mathews Lutheran Church in 1922. This building is not the original structure of 1860.

1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
726842f-a.folder: Hawtree Creek Road & 135th Avenue, Queens, NY
